author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-276 Added test corpus server instance. Thanks to Tommaso Teofili for provding this class as part of a patch he attached to OPENNLP - 261.

author: rhuijben
msg: * STATUS: Nominate fix for 'svn info' on conflict crash

author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve segfault when retrieving svn_wc_entry_t on a binary conflict. Also
fix a similar segfault in svn on printing conflicts. (Issue #3998)
(read_one_entry): Assume that conflict paths can be NULL.
(print_info): Assume that conflict paths can be NULL. Make conflict paths
(binary_tree_conflict): Remove XFail. Add issue number and update the
conflict path verification to make the test pass. Cleanup whitespace

author: fmui
msg: added more TCK test (relationships, multifiling, unfiling, policy checks)

author: castagna
msg: Specified version of Maven plugins to remove warnings.
